title: Contemporary 4 Bedroom Hillside Sea View Villa in Plai Laem
description:
Key Features
• 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom modern villa
• Infinity-edge pool overlooking the bay
• Open-plan living/dining space with integrated kitchen
• Floor-to-ceiling windows in every room
• En-suite bathrooms with rain showers
• Private gym and sauna
• Landscaped garden & outdoor lounge
• 2-car garage
• 5 minutes to local amenities
• Freehold
